desc: A popular magazine issue containing articles and interviews about various celebrities.

sttData.content: Welcome to this special issue of our magazine dedicated to celebrities.
sttData.speaker: Narrator

sttData.content: In this issue, we'll explore the lives and careers of several notable personalities.
sttData.speaker: Narrator

textData: This issue of our magazine focuses on the lives and careers of two popular Hollywood actors - Brad Pitt and Angelina Jolie. Brad Pitt, born on December 18, 1963, started his acting career with minor roles in television series and later transitioned to the big screen with a breakthrough role in 'Thelma and Louise'. Angelina Jolie, born on June 4, 1975, began her acting career as a teenager before gaining critical acclaim for her role in 'Girl, Interrupted'. Both actors have been in various high-profile relationships and have won numerous awards throughout their careers.
